name: Queen of the Hill (Sisyphean Games)
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity Arcade controls jam with the theme of swarms.

Play as an ant queen. Collect your swarm of ants and sacrifice them to kill the bugs and rack up a high score.

There is a bug which currently causes enemies to stop spawning after a little while.

Controls:
Move with wasd/arrow keys
Rotate attached ants with space. Alternates rotation direction with each press
